textAfterTable: Game Overview In Disney Epic Mickey: Power Of Illusion, gamers will play as Mickey Mouse as he infiltrates the Castle of Illusion on a quest to put an end to the evil witch Mizrabel's diabolical intentions. The game is a follow-up to Epic Mickey and also a follow-up to Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse, a 1990 Mickey Mouse game for the Sega Genesis.
